text: Approach #1: Top-to-Bottom > Start with the root and "pull” data up from its children. » Tuples are always passed with function calls. Approach #2: Bottom-to-Top » Start with leaf nodes and push data to their parents. — Allows for tighter control of caches/registers in pipelines. , ë_ 7 £2CMU-DB ; — - - L e ——————— - _—__—- — — IM P PI 4% 2515/1:0537 - PLAN PROCESSING DIRECTION > © v 0G O — 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
